title: Help with honour
body:
Been stuck at honour 2 since the honour system came out... was wondering if anyone could give me any tips on how to level up?
Thank you.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: The fastest way to gain honor is simply by playing more games without dishonorable conduct. While you might not get reported or punished, certain less-than-honorable conduct can still hold some weight.
The thing I don't understand is that a few of my friends only played about 2-3 games and reached honour 3. How is that possible?
